description: Working on the addition of new features and resolving bugs in the website.
Improving the accessibility of the websites for the better experience of the users
Conducting weekly meetings for the UI team across various locations.
Learning and implementing new frameworks and technologies.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness across devices.
Engaged in code reviews, debugging, and efficient issue resolution.
Coordinated with the design team for intuitive and visually appealing interfaces.
Proactively learned new technologies to enhance skills and boost productivity.
Worked with the development team to create and maintain responsive and visually appealing web applications.
Crafted cross-browser compatible user interfaces while adhering to web standards.
Ensured project requirements and  deadlines were met by maintaining effective communication with the team members.
